This is an example app to demonstrate the design of a Privacy Friendly App. Further explanations can be found in the Privacy Friendly App Guide.

There are multiple ways to display basic buttons. Button 1 is the basic button. If you wish to separate a button visually, use button 2. The buttons 3–5 are examples for highlighted buttons. Depending on the app other colors are possible.
Use the button in the lower left corner to call the Welcome Dialog.
This is the default main menu for game apps. The viewpager above should be used to switch between game modes.

Privacy Friendly Sketching is an app to create and manage simple drawings and sketches. In addition to that, it offers the possibility of renaming sketches, selecting various backgrounds and sharing the sketches with friends.
How do I create a new sketch?
On the gallery screen you can tap on the + symbol on the bottom right corner to create a new sketch.
Privacy Friendly App Example does not require any permission. It further does not include any tracking mechanisms or advertisement.
Privacy Friendly App Example does not require any permission.
This application belongs to the group of Privacy Friendly Apps developed by the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT). Sourcecode licensed under GPLv3. Images copyright KIT and Google Inc.
More information can be found on:
Privacy Friendly Sketching is an app to create and manage simple paintings and sketches without the need of extra permissions.

The gallery displays an overview of existing sketches. Using the + symbol on the bottom right corner of the screen allows you to create a new sketch. A long touch over a preview allows you to delete an existing sketch.
In addition to the editing tools on the bottom side of the screen you can select a background color or a background image.You can also share the current sketch with your friends. Have fun!
Preparing Encryption and Database for first time use..
What would you like to do?
Where would you like to export to?
How do i edit/delete a sketch?
On the gallery screen. you can tap on the preview of a sketch to edit an existing sketch. A long tap on the preview allows you to delete an existing sketch.
How can I share a sketch?
While editing a sketch,you can tap the three dot button on the top right to share the current sketch.
How do I name a sketch?
While editing a sketch, you can tap the three dot button on the top right, which will give you the possibility of renaming your sketch.
How do I select another background?
How do I export a sketch onto the device storage?

While editing a sketch, you can tap the three dot button on the top right, which will give you the possibility of exporting your sketch onto the device storage. However, exporting an image onto the device storage requires writing permission!
While editing a sketch, you can tap the three dot button on the top right, which will give you the possibility of selecting another background.
